title: The Two Minute Rule
description: Max Holman knew the two minute rule. Get in, get the cash, and get out. But two minures can be a lifetime in one moment of weakness he botched a bank job and was sent away for years. Now released from prison, Max wants to reconcile with his estranged son, an L.C. Cop. Instead he receives the devastating news that his son's been gunned down in cold blood.
